title: Flore
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Organic, Juice bar, Take-out
description: Los Angeles vegan restaurant cafe. Menu features classic American and comfort food (that's all vegan) plus fresh juices. Breakfast is served on weekends. Small and causal with a counter and glass case displaying deli salads and a small selection of organic produce for sale. Gets crowded at mealtime, especially on weekends. Weekend brunch from 10am-1pm.
